00020 MuError::MuError(void)
00021 {
00022         e = MuERROR_NONE;
00023 }
00024 
00025 MuError::MuError(short newError)
00026 {
00027         e = newError;
00028 }
00029 
00030 short MuError::Get(void)
00031 {
00032         return e;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void MuError::Set(short newError)
00036 {
00037         e = newError;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void MuError::Set(MuError inError)
00041 {
00042         e = inError.Get();
00043 }

00045 string MuError::Message(void)
00046 {
00047         string message = "";
00048         switch(e)
00049         {
00050                 case MuERROR_INSUF_MEM:
00051                         message = "Insuficient memory to complete task!";
00052                         break;
00053                         
00054                 case MuERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER:
00055                         message = "Parameter number is out of range!";
00056                         break;
00057                         
00058                 case MuERROR_PARAM_BLOCK_NOT_INITIALIZED:
00059                         message = "Parameter Block is not initialized!";
00060                         break;
00061                         
00062                 case MuERROR_CANNOT_INIT:
00063                         message = "Parameter Block contains data!";
00064                         break;
00065                         
00066                 case MuERROR_INVALID_PARAMBLOCK_SIZE:
00067                         message = "Invalid size for Parameter Block!";
00068                         break;
00069                         
00070                 case MuERROR_NOTE_LIST_IS_EMPTY:
00071                         message = "Note list is empty!";
00072                         break;
00073                         
00074                 case MuERROR_NOTE_NOT_FOUND:
00075                         message = "Couldn't find requested note!";
00076                         break;
00077                 
00078                 case MuERROR_COULDNT_INIT_MATERIAL:
00079                         message = "Couldn't allocate array of voices!";
00080                         break;
00081                 
00082                 case MuERROR_MATERIAL_IS_EMPTY:
00083                         message = "Material contains no data!";
00084                         break;
00085                 
00086                 case MuERROR_INVALID_VOICE_NUMBER:
00087                         message = "Requested voice doesnt exist!";
00088                         break;
00089                         
00090                 case MuERROR_COULDNT_OPEN_INPUT_FILE:
00091                         message = "Couldn't open input file!";
00092                         break;
00093                         
00094                 case MuERROR_COULDNT_OPEN_OUTPUT_FILE:
00095                         message = "Couldn't open output file!";
00096                         break;
00097                         
00098                 case MuERROR_INVALID_SCALE_DEGREE:
00099                         message = "Invalid scale degree!";
00100                         break;
00101                         
00102                 case MuERROR_INVALID_NOTE_RANGE:
00103                         message = "Invalid note range!";
00104                         break;
00105                         
00106         }
00107         
00108         return message;
00109 }
